languages.text: {n}Под вашим выразительно-пристальным взглядом Абеляр едва заметно тушуется.{/n} "Флот — древнее учреждение, со своими неписанными законами и правилами. Порой, в пылу официального брифинга или неформальной беседы, я нарушал эти правила, настаивая на своем. Бывает непросто подобрать слова, в точности выражающие мое отношение к ситуации или поступкам других и при этом не звучащие чересчур едко или вызывающе. Многие в командовании были склонны считать мою манеру общения... чрезмерной для человека моего ранга".

traits.locale_text: {n}Под вашим выразительно-пристальным взглядом Абеляр едва заметно тушуется.{/n} "Флот — древнее учреждение, со своими неписанными законами и правилами. Порой, в пылу официального брифинга или неформальной беседы, я нарушал эти правила, настаивая на своем. Бывает непросто подобрать слова, в точности выражающие мое отношение к ситуации или поступкам других и при этом не звучащие чересчур едко или вызывающе. Многие в командовании были склонны считать мою манеру общения... чрезмерной для человека моего ранга".
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Abelard seems to crack slightly under your intense stare.{/n} "The Navis Imperialis is an ancient institution with its own mandates and muster lists. On occasion, in the heat of an official briefing or an informal discussion, I violated those rules, determined to press my point. It is challenging to choose the words to accurately express my opinion on a situation or the actions of others that do not sound overly scathing or confrontational. Many in command were inclined to view my manner of speaking as... unbefitting a person of my rank."

languages.text: {n}在你锐利的目光下，阿贝拉德忍不住开口坦白。{/n}“帝国海军是个古老的机构，有它自己的管辖权与部署方式。偶尔在官方简报会上，或是在某些非正式的讨论中，我可能会讨论得过于激烈，决心强调我的看法，而违背了这些原则。选择准确的词语表达我对某种情况或某些人的看法，而又不至于听起来过于尖刻，这其实是件很有挑战性的事情。指挥部许多人都倾向于认为，我那样的说话方式……并不符合我的军阶。”
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard seems to crack slightly under your intense stare.{/n} "The Navis Imperialis is an ancient institution with its own mandates and muster lists. On occasion, in the heat of an official briefing or an informal discussion, I violated those rules, determined to press my point. It is challenging to choose the words to accurately express my opinion on a situation or the actions of others that do not sound overly scathing or confrontational. Many in command were inclined to view my manner of speaking as... unbefitting a person of my rank."

traits.locale_text: {n}在你锐利的目光下，阿贝拉德忍不住开口坦白。{/n}“帝国海军是个古老的机构，有它自己的管辖权与部署方式。偶尔在官方简报会上，或是在某些非正式的讨论中，我可能会讨论得过于激烈，决心强调我的看法，而违背了这些原则。选择准确的词语表达我对某种情况或某些人的看法，而又不至于听起来过于尖刻，这其实是件很有挑战性的事情。指挥部许多人都倾向于认为，我那样的说话方式……并不符合我的军阶。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}Abelard seems to crack slightly under your intense stare.{/n} "The Navis Imperialis is an ancient institution with its own mandates and muster lists. On occasion, in the heat of an official briefing or an informal discussion, I violated those rules, determined to press my point. It is challenging to choose the words to accurately express my opinion on a situation or the actions of others that do not sound overly scathing or confrontational. Many in command were inclined to view my manner of speaking as... unbefitting a person of my rank."

languages.text: {n}Abelard parece ceder levemente ante tu intensa mirada.{/n} «La Navis Imperialis es una institución antigua con sus propios mandatos y listas de deberes. En ocasiones, durante un informe oficial acalorado o una conversación informal, infringí esas reglas con intención de dejar clara mi opinión. Me resulta difícil expresarme sobre situaciones y sobre las acciones de otros de forma que no suene mordaz ni hiriente. Muchos de mis superiores consideraban que mi forma de expresarme era... inapropiada para alguien de mi rango».
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard seems to crack slightly under your intense stare.{/n} "The Navis Imperialis is an ancient institution with its own mandates and muster lists. On occasion, in the heat of an official briefing or an informal discussion, I violated those rules, determined to press my point. It is challenging to choose the words to accurately express my opinion on a situation or the actions of others that do not sound overly scathing or confrontational. Many in command were inclined to view my manner of speaking as... unbefitting a person of my rank."

En ocasiones, durante un informe oficial acalorado o una conversación informal, infringí esas reglas con intención de dejar clara mi opinión. Me resulta difícil expresarme sobre situaciones y sobre las acciones de otros de forma que no suene mordaz ni hiriente. Muchos de mis superiores consideraban que mi forma de expresarme era... inapropiada para alguien de mi rango».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}あなたの強い眼差しに、アベラルドはわずかにたじろいだようだった。{/n}「帝国宇宙軍は古くからある組織で、独自の任務と招集名簿がございます。時には、私は公式のブリーフィングや非公式な議論の最中に、自分の主張を押し通すために、その規則を破ってしまうこともありました。ある状況や他者の行動に対する自分の意見を、過度に辛辣に聞こえたり対立的に聞こえたりしないように正確に表現する言葉を選ぶのは難しいものです。指揮官の多くは、私の話し方を…階級にふさわしくないと見る傾向にありました」
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard seems to crack slightly under your intense stare.{/n} "The Navis Imperialis is an ancient institution with its own mandates and muster lists. On occasion, in the heat of an official briefing or an informal discussion, I violated those rules, determined to press my point. It is challenging to choose the words to accurately express my opinion on a situation or the actions of others that do not sound overly scathing or confrontational. Many in command were inclined to view my manner of speaking as... unbefitting a person of my rank."

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたの強い眼差しに、アベラルドはわずかにたじろいだようだった。{/n}「帝国宇宙軍は古くからある組織で、独自の任務と招集名簿がございます。時には、私は公式のブリーフィングや非公式な議論の最中に、自分の主張を押し通すために、その規則を破ってしまうこともありました。ある状況や他者の行動に対する自分の意見を、過度に辛辣に聞こえたり対立的に聞こえたりしないように正確に表現する言葉を選ぶのは難しいものです。指揮官の多くは、私の話し方を…階級にふさわしくないと見る傾向にありました」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Abelard scheint unter deinem intensiven Blick einzuknicken.{/n} "Die Navis Imperialis ist eine uralte Institution mit eigenem Mandat und eigener Sicherheitsrolle. Ich habe im Eifer eines offiziellen Briefings oder einer informellen Diskussion gelegentlich diese Regeln verstoßen, entschlossen, mein Argument durchzusetzen. Ich finde schwer die richtigen Worte, um meiner Meinung zu einer Situation oder zu den Handlungen anderer Ausdruck zu verleihen, ohne allzu vernichtend oder konfrontativ zu klingen. Viele der Befehlshaber werteten meine Kommentare als ... meines Ranges unangemessen."
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard seems to crack slightly under your intense stare.{/n} "The Navis Imperialis is an ancient institution with its own mandates and muster lists. On occasion, in the heat of an official briefing or an informal discussion, I violated those rules, determined to press my point. It is challenging to choose the words to accurately express my opinion on a situation or the actions of others that do not sound overly scathing or confrontational. Many in command were inclined to view my manner of speaking as... unbefitting a person of my rank."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard scheint unter deinem intensiven Blick einzuknicken.{/n} "Die Navis Imperialis ist eine uralte Institution mit eigenem Mandat und eigener Sicherheitsrolle. Ich habe im Eifer eines offiziellen Briefings oder einer informellen Diskussion gelegentlich diese Regeln verstoßen, entschlossen, mein Argument durchzusetzen. Ich finde schwer die richtigen Worte, um meiner Meinung zu einer Situation oder zu den Handlungen anderer Ausdruck zu verleihen, ohne allzu vernichtend oder konfrontativ zu klingen. Viele der Befehlshaber werteten meine Kommentare als ... meines Ranges unangemessen."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Abélard semble céder légèrement sous votre regard intense.{/n} « La Navis Imperialis est une institution ancienne qui possède ses propres lois et attribue à chacun un rôle bien précis. Au cours de briefings officiels ou de discussion informelles, il m'est arrivé d'enfreindre ces règles afin de me faire entendre clairement. Il m'est difficile d'exprimer correctement mon opinion sur une situation ou une autre personne sans employer des mots qui me font paraître trop critique ou agressif. Beaucoup d'officiers du commandement considéraient que ma façon de parler était... irrévérencieuse pour quelqu'un de mon rang. »
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard seems to crack slightly under your intense stare.{/n} "The Navis Imperialis is an ancient institution with its own mandates and muster lists. On occasion, in the heat of an official briefing or an informal discussion, I violated those rules, determined to press my point. It is challenging to choose the words to accurately express my opinion on a situation or the actions of others that do not sound overly scathing or confrontational. Many in command were inclined to view my manner of speaking as... unbefitting a person of my rank."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abélard semble céder légèrement sous votre regard intense.{/n} « La Navis Imperialis est une institution ancienne qui possède ses propres lois et attribue à chacun un rôle bien précis. Au cours de briefings officiels ou de discussion informelles, il m'est arrivé d'enfreindre ces règles afin de me faire entendre clairement. Il m'est difficile d'exprimer correctement mon opinion sur une situation ou une autre personne sans employer des mots qui me font paraître trop critique ou agressif. Beaucoup d'officiers du commandement considéraient que ma façon de parler était... irrévérencieuse pour quelqu'un de mon rang. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Abelard, derin bakışlarının altında bir nebze eziliyor.{/n} "Navis İmperialis, kendi düzeni ve kurallarıyla kadim bir kuruluştur. Resmî toplantılarda yahut gayriresmî tartışmalarda, durumun da getirdiği fevrilikle kendi fikrimi kabul ettirmek için bu kuralları deldiğim olmuştur. Bir durumla veya başkalarının yaptıklarıyla ilgili düşüncelerimi, tartıştığım kişileri çok incitmeden yahut yermeden belirtmekte zorlanıyorum. Komutada bulunanların çoğu, konuşma biçimimin... Kadememe yaraşmadığını düşünürdü."
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard seems to crack slightly under your intense stare.{/n} "The Navis Imperialis is an ancient institution with its own mandates and muster lists. On occasion, in the heat of an official briefing or an informal discussion, I violated those rules, determined to press my point. It is challenging to choose the words to accurately express my opinion on a situation or the actions of others that do not sound overly scathing or confrontational. Many in command were inclined to view my manner of speaking as... unbefitting a person of my rank."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard, derin bakışlarının altında bir nebze eziliyor.{/n} "Navis Imperialis, kendi kuralları ve röle cetveliyle kadim bir kuruluştur. Resmî toplantılarda yahut gayriresmî tartışmalarda, durumun da getirdiği fevrilikle kendi fikrimi galip getirmek için bu kuralları deldiğim olmuştur. Bir durumla veya başkalarının yaptıklarıyla ilgili fikirlerimi, tartıştığım kişileri çok incitmeden yahut yermeden belirtmekte zorlanıyorum. Komutada bulunanların çoğu, konuşma biçimimin... Kadememe yaraşmadığını düşünürdü."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
